title: Bajaj teases 2024 Pulsar NS200, here's what to expect
description: Bajaj Auto is updating the Pulsar NS200 with new features and design upgrades. Cryptic teasers hint at Bluetooth connectivity and the bike is expected to have a fresh LED headlamp, a fully-digital instrument cluster, a trusted 199.5cc engine, USD front forks, a monoshock unit, and disc brakes with dual-channel ABS.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
